name: Eyes of Tomorrow
flavor_text: "I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." —Clovis Bray

frame.name: Eyes on All
frame.description: This weapon is capable of tracking and firing at multiple targets simultaneously.

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description: Killing four or more combatants in a single volley increases the damage of the next volley.
perks.name: Adaptive Ordnance

perks.description:
This stock makes the weapon stable but heavy
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Fitted Stock
